channel.title: High IQ on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in High IQ on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Meta’s Smart Glasses Might Make You Smarter. They’ll Certainly Make You More Awkward
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg claims anyone not wearing smart glasses will be at a “cognitive disadvantage” in the future. But you’ll have to pay a hefty social price for those added smarts.
